titles.title: To amend the Abraham Lincoln Commemorative Coin Act to adjust how surcharges are distributed.
To amend the Abraham Lincoln Commemorative Coin Act to adjust how surcharges are distributed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: Amends the Abraham Lincoln Commemorative Coin Act to modify the distribution of coin surcharges, specifying certain amounts for: (1) the Abraham Lincoln Bicentennial Foundation, (2) Ford's Theater, (3) President Lincoln's Cottage at the Soldiers' Home, and (4) the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum.
